snippet: David Ferrer and Nicolas Almagro won their clay-court matches to give Spain a commanding 2-0 lead over the United States in the Davis Cup semifinal.
lead_paragraph: David Ferrer and Nicolas Almagro won their clay-court matches to give Spain a commanding 2-0 lead over the United States in the Davis Cup semifinal.

headline.main: Spain Sweeps United States in Singles for 2-0 Davis Cup Lead
headline.print_headline: Spain Sweeps United States in Singles for 2-0 Davis Cup Lead
